revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
corrected date format in title; added call no., annotations
Regularize spelling and complete Chase annotation
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words
Annotate Dr. Chase, Seymour, Smith, and French

body.p:
i write again to let you know we are all in the land of the living had a pretty hard squeese squeeze to worry through but we have got along so far all pretty well considering this awful weather we have had) these rooms is quite cool if there is any air at all but monday Monday night we had to keep shut up all the front part of the house on sunday Sunday there was one of the car horses died and he laid just acrost across the street and he laid there till tuesday Tuesday and the whole neighborhood was distressed with the smell the horses dropt dropped from the cars in several other routs routes
well waltWalt i got the letter tuesday Tuesday this week it dont don't make any very material difference only i get figgety fidgety for fear its it's stolen there dont don't seem to be quite so much complaint complaint of loosing losing letters as there was at one time) i hope you will keep well walterWalter you are very carefull careful i know i think its it's so nessary necessary to be i wish georgeGeorge was half as carefull careful they havent haven't done much on the main till to day they have been raising the stone from where the old tunnel was filled up so they havent haven't laid much pipe till to day so it was well for georgeGeorge as it wouldent wouldn't take much to get him to feel the effects of the heat

georges George's house is raised was raised last saturday Saturday three story and cellar with stone under smith Smith is in a hurry to get it done as he is going to oversee frenchesFrench's buildings) i seldom hear from the st louLou is St. Louis folks they are very slow to write i wrote a letter to mattyMatty telling her i just wrote to let her know mamma lived in brooklyn Brooklyn yet i think mattiMatty might write oftener as for han i dont don't know as i shall ever hear from her it seems so strange if they was old and lame like me i
shouldent shouldn't think so strange well i suppose they all have enoughf enough to doodo) o walterWalter the nomanation nomination aint ain't it great i wish you could see the eagle it is worse than ever all the respectable radicals is in favor of seymoreSeymour the eagle says they are nearly all copperheads around here but they are kinly kindly put aback if chaseChase had only been the one they would have carried everything before them

closer.salute: good bie walterWalter dear take care of yourself and i will try to doo do the same i am pretty well
